      • addNewConcert

        public boolean addNewConcert(Concert c)
        Description copied from interface: TicketOffice
        Adds a new concert to the system. Note that setting up the concert should not produce any kind of clash with the existing concerts, etc.
        Specified by:
        addNewConcert in interface TicketOffice
        Parameters:
        c - The concert to be added
        Returns:
        True if an only if the concert c was not null, was well formed and did not clash with the information already in the system. False otherwise.

      • replaceConcert

        public boolean replaceConcert(Concert c)
        Description copied from interface: TicketOffice
        Replace an existing concert. The system must be able to indentify the concert as "already existing", then proceed for its replacement.
        Specified by:
        replaceConcert in interface TicketOffice
        Parameters:
        c - The concert to be added
        Returns:
        True if an only if the concert c was not null, was well formed and did not clash with the information already in the system. False otherwise.

      • deleteConcert

        public boolean deleteConcert(Concert c)
        Description copied from interface: TicketOffice
        Deletes a concert from the system. In case c did not exist in the system, this action has no impact.
        Specified by:
        deleteConcert in interface TicketOffice
        Parameters:
        c - The concert to be removed
        Returns:
        True if an only if the concert c was not null, and existed already in the system. False otherwise.

                int id)

        Specified by:

        e - The event
        id - The identifier
        Returns:

        public boolean addSale(Ticket t,
              Client c,
              java.lang.Float price,
              java.lang.String cCard)
        Description copied from interface: TicketOffice
        Registers the sale of an existing ticket to an existing client.
        Specified by:
        addSale in interface TicketOffice
        Parameters:
        t - The ticket to be sold
        c - The client who buys the ticket
        price - The price of the sale
        cCard - The card the transaction was performed with
        Returns:
        True if and only if the ticket, client and card existed, and the sale could be registered (e.g. the ticket was not sold in beforehand, etc.)
